content: It's great to hear that you're exploring other ways to manage your pain. Remember that it's important to work with your healthcare provider to develop a comprehensive pain management plan that can include a combination of techniques, including exercise, physical therapy, medication, and other complementary approaches like massage or acupuncture. Also, be patient and persistent - some of these techniques may take time to work, and it may take some trial and error to find what works best for you. Good luck!
